TopicTitle: It would be a perfect moment to release 0.20.... for me :)

Articles.Content:
I am literally bored out of my mind... The forecast is predicting nothing but rain for the next couple of days (since my job revolves around warm weather and sunshine) I have literally nothing to do

Has anyone heard anything new regarding 0.20 since the last Facebook "Milestone" post?
"When will it be released?" threads are against the rules. I recommend you actually read the rules and stickies before posting.
It'd be perfect for me because I'm not dead yet, and neither is my pc, and there hasn't been any apocalyptic prophecies going around for a while, so I don't need to worry about that.
I envy you. I have my exams on Thursday and Friday, so a .20 release would ruin me! Or maybe I'm overreacting

"When will it be released?" threads are against the rules. I recommend you actually read the rules and stickies before posting.

If you actually read my post... I stated that for me it would be a convenient time. Not asking when it will be released. I was also just wondering if anybody else had heard anything. Because the Devs tend to post comments in random threads that I miss

IBTL... plus some more text to meet 10 character limit!

hopefully released this week
It's going to be released by Thursday. I can FEEL it.
Just watch as they release it next month just to spite everyone.

No, it wouldn't. All my exams are on this week, and those are really important exams. Bombing only one will make me lose 2 years of progress.

Srsly.

Relax guys, 0.20 will be released....

....when it's done!

Closing

I envy you. I have my exams on Thursday and Friday, so a .20 release would ruin me! Or maybe I'm overreacting

I'll tell the devs not to release it until friday.

just kidding ofcourse
